register.name: ACTLR_EL1
register.description: Provides IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED configuration and control options for execution at EL1 and EL0.

register.name: ACTLR_EL2
register.description: Provides IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED configuration and control options for EL2.

register.name: ACTLR_EL3
register.description: Provides IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED configuration and control options for EL3.

register.name: AFSR0_EL1
register.description: Provides additional IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED fault status information for exceptions taken to EL1.

register.name: AFSR0_EL2
register.description: Provides additional IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED fault status information for exceptions taken to EL2.

register.name: AFSR0_EL3
register.description: Provides additional IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED fault status information for exceptions taken to EL3.

register.name: AFSR1_EL1
register.description: Provides additional IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED fault status information for exceptions taken to EL1.

register.name: AFSR1_EL2
register.description: Provides additional IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED fault status information for exceptions taken to EL2.

register.name: AFSR1_EL3
register.description: Provides additional IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED fault status information for exceptions taken to EL3.

register.name: AMAIR_EL1
register.description: Provides IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED memory attributes for the memory regions specified by MAIR_EL1.

register.name: AMAIR_EL2
register.description: Provides IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED memory attributes for the memory regions specified by MAIR_EL2.

register.name: AMAIR_EL3
register.description: Provides IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED memory attributes for the memory regions specified by MAIR_EL3.

register.name: HACR_EL2
register.description: Controls trapping to EL2 of IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED aspects of Non-secure EL1 or EL0 operation.
